features: 🧰【 6 Set STEM Robotics Kit 】: This STEM Toys for 10 Year Old Boys includes a bubble machine, a doodling robot, a balance robot car, a fiber optic light, a reptile robot, an obstacle avoidance robot car and motor kit needed by these stem robots for kids ages 8-12. NOT INCLUDED: AA BATTERIES, BUBBLE SOLUTION.

🤖【 Beginner Robot Building Kit 】: These are simple coding robots for kids to build. Easy to assemble and are rainy day fun indoor activities for kids ages 5-7 6-8 8-10 8-12 10-12 year old. A great way to keep children away from screens and still having fun. Come and build your own robot!

☘【 Educational Science Kits for Kids 10-12 】: Young Inventors could learn physical science such as electric circuits, coding, programming, engineering from this Creative Science Kit. Science fair project kits for 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th grade elementary classroom.
🌈【 Science Craft Kits for Kids 6-9 】: They are cool and fun arts and crafts for boys ages 8-12. Children will enjoy this crafting kit.
🎁【 Gift for 10 Year Old Boy 】: Packaged in a beautiful stem box, these STEM Projects are best gifts for 9 year old boy & girl for birthday and Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product I will buy more
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what it said it was great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The kids liked them but the item was much smaller than it appeared in the picture. One day I’m going to remember to check the dimensions before I order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a hit!
reviews.reviewText: My 9 year old son LOVES this kit. He spent hours building the different robots and the end results were all unique and fun. This was such a cool learning opportunity and I will be keeping my eye out for other sets like this. The only thing to keep on mind is that they final builds are fragile. My 3 year old has gotten his hand on a few and broken pieces off. My 9 year old needed some help here and there but this kit is probably good for 8 and up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun projects for kids and adults together
reviews.reviewText: Great projects, simple yet sufficiently detailed instructions. Some of the pieces are rather small, and the screwdriver will slip if sufficient pressure is not applied, so little ones will probably require help to get it together, but it's a good project to do together. They're not made from the longest-lasting materials, so they won't last forever, but this is not the kind of thing I need sitting around the house forever anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute idea but…cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: The screws are ridiculously small. Even as an adult with decent dexterity it’s hard for me to handle those. I had to use tweezers. Then once I got it built it burned my son’s hand! After running for a few mins it got hot to the touch and actually started smoking. Photos of the melted parts are attached. Very cheap materials used which I get I didn’t pay much for the entire kit but I’d like for it not to melt and burn. 🤷🏽‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wish the robots where bigger.
reviews.reviewText: The robots where very small. so are all of the parts. The kids had trouble working with such small screws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A STEM Kit that will keep young and minds active for a long time - A Spark for Robots
reviews.reviewText: This STEM Science Technology Engineering & Math Robotics Kit should be fun for kids and their parents. This kind of kit is something that the family can do as a project to teach one’s children how to figure things out. There are clearly enough motors, gears, parts galore along with loads of fiber optics and colored lights to build so many different devices, toys and practical devices. The limit here lies more the one’s imagination than anything else. This may be one of the more stimulating kits that I have seen on Amazon for the money. This STEM project Kit will keep young hands and minds active for quite a long time.If your child is doing well with Legos and can follow instructions, then this is an obvious next step for them. It will take some adults help every now and then to help them understand what + and – is on a battery and not to connect wires, batteries, and motors for the robots. This kit will stimulate their desire to learn more, if encouraged. The parent will need to be the judge as to what age to connect the child with this kit. I would certainly follow the ages on the box and know your own child. Should be fun for the child and parent alike. Five Stars for the price and potential of the learning in the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You will need a soldering iron
reviews.reviewText: I order a different set of these and built them with my 4 year old daughter and we had such a great time that I decided to order this set as well! I found these kits well designed. I wish that the wires came pre-soldered to the motors. The directions don't mention that you will need one, but you will. I had no issues with soldering all the motors, but not everyone knows how and I would have preferred that I came that way out of the box. If you don't know how to use a soldering iron, I would look for a different kit. That being said, these are super fun to put together with your children and are affordable.
